metadata.synopsis: This fires when the player enters the victim gallery, if the player can't speak (wildshape, summons, etc.). She appears to taunt them and then vanishes.

2.text: You are as thick as they come, sweetness.
2.context: NodeContext: Threatening smile while taunting player.The old lady act is gone.

1.text: That pretty little eye of yours is mine. Did you think you could sneak down here without my say so?

0.text: This is my personal play house. And you don't have an invite. Get. Out.
0.context: NodeContext: The player is in a gallery full of your victims - horribly twisted and tortured. You're hinting that they will join them soon. Cruel and malicious.
